scenes.background: You acknowledged the issue and suggested a proactive future approach. A few hours later, [Monica] and [Bob] start discussing the situation face-to-face in the office kitchen.
scenes.description: 'I get that you need your break, but it feels like you're not considering the team's needs. What if we all took time off when there was an urgent task?'

options.text: I understand your point, but I believe everyone deserves a break to be more productive in the long run.
options.analysis: You emphasized the importance of breaks for productivity, showing good emotional perception and empathy. However, it lacks strong social skills.

options.text: Maybe you're right, but if we planned better, we wouldn't be in this situation.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the point but shifted the focus to planning, displaying good social skills and emotional balance. Empathy and motivation could be improved.

options.text: It's not fair to assume I don't care about the team just because I need some time off.
options.analysis: You defended your need for time off, showing good emotional control and motivation, but empathy and emotional perception were lacking.
